Index.title: Travel to your desired destination with the help of HOPPLA

Footer.Pronounce: Travel to your desired destination with the help of HOPPLA. Get the latest information and book a ticket with your smartphone.

RideDetails.title: Ride Details
RideDetails.priceForOnePerson: Price for {count, plural, =1 {1 person} other {# persons}}

OfferSeats.title: Become a HOPPLA driver and save on travel costs by sharing your ride with passengers.

OfferSeatsForm.title: Offer Seats
OfferSeatsForm.FromPlaceholder: Enter the city you are leaving from
OfferSeatsForm.ToPlaceholder: Enter the city you are going to
OfferSeatsForm.SaveMoney: Save up to minimum <priceBox>{price}₾</priceBox> on your first ride.

OfferSeatsSuccess.title: Your ride has been successfully published
OfferSeatsSuccess.message: Your ride has been successfully published. You can view it in the list of rides.

OfferSeatsError.title: An error occurred while publishing the ride
OfferSeatsError.message: An error occurred while publishing the ride. Please try again later.

OfferSeatsConfirmation.title: Offer Seats Confirmation
OfferSeatsConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to offer seats?

OfferSeatsInfoCards.title: Hoopla is the best way to travel comfortably and cheaply.
OfferSeatsInfoCards.SaveOnTravelCostsDescription: Share your ride with passengers on your way, and save every time you travel by car. Sign up as a driver to start saving on travel costs.
OfferSeatsInfoCards.JoinATrustworthyCommunityDescription: Join a community of 1.2 million members, and enjoy the benefits of carpooling and sharing rides with others.
OfferSeatsInfoCards.CarpoolingMadeSimpleDescription: Offer your seats and travel with other members. Carpooling is a simple, fun, and cost-effective way to travel.

AffordableAdventures.title: Affordable Adventures
AffordableAdventures.description: Discover great places to visit without spending too much money! Whether you're traveling by bus or sharing a ride with others, we have lots of affordable options for you.

SafeTravels.title: Safe Travels
SafeTravels.description: We care about your safety. We check the people who use our service and the companies we work with to make sure they're trustworthy. You can relax knowing who you'll be traveling with and book securely through our app.

EasyBooking.title: Easy Booking
EasyBooking.description: Booking your next trip is super easy with our app. Just search for nearby rides, click on the one you like, and you're all set to go!

StaySafeFromScams.title: Stay Safe from Scams
StaySafeFromScams.description: We want to keep you safe while using our platform. Even though we try our best, scams still happen. Learn how to spot and report scams to help us protect you.

PublishARide.title: Save Money on Your Trips!
PublishARide.description: Start saving money on your travels today with Hoppla! By offering your rides on our platform, you can share the costs with your passengers, making your trips more affordable and enjoyable for everyone involved.

EarningABonusForCarpooling.title: Earning a Bonus for Carpooling!
EarningABonusForCarpooling.description: Exciting update for drivers: You are now eligible to earn rewards for your carpooling! Qualify for the Carpool Bonus by completing 3 carpool trips within 3 months.

content.question1: How can I book a ride on Hoppla?
content.answer1: Booking your next trip is super easy with our app. Just search for nearby rides, click on the one you like, and you're all set to go!
content.question2: Are the rides on Hoppla affordable?
content.answer2: Absolutely! Hoppla offers affordable options for traveling by car or sharing a ride with others. Discover great places to visit without spending too much money!
content.question3: Is safety a priority on Hoppla?
content.answer3: Yes, safety is our top priority. We thoroughly check the people who use our service and the people we work with to ensure they're trustworthy. You can relax knowing who you'll be traveling with and book securely through our app.

Hero.title: Use {company} to travel where you want
Hero.subtitle: Hoppla connects you to top transportation options in your area, from buses to carpooling, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable travel experience for you.
Hero.aboutTitle: Travel to your desired destination with the help of {company}
Hero.aboutDesc: Hoppla is a platform that connects you with the best transportation services in your area. We offer a wide range of services, including buses, carpooling, and more. Our goal is to make your travel experience as smooth and enjoyable as possible.

reliableService.title: Reliable Service
reliableService.description: You can trust Hoppla for safe and dependable bus rides. Our drivers are experienced, and our buses are well looked after, so you'll have a smooth journey every time.

comfortableTravel.title: Enjoy Comfortable Bus Travel
comfortableTravel.description: Hoppla offers comfy and cheap bus rides for all your travel needs. Whether you're going far or just across town, our buses are a great way to get there without spending too much.

bookRide.title: Book Your Bus Ride Now
bookRide.description: Ready to go on an adventure? Book your bus ride with Hoppla today and enjoy a comfortable and affordable journey!

findEasyTravel.title: Find Easy Mini Bus Travel
findEasyTravel.description: Discover how simple it is to travel in mini buses with Hoppla! Whether you're going around town or on a short trip, our mini buses give you comfy rides at low prices. Fast Rides

comfyTravel.title: Comfy Travel
comfyTravel.description: Relax in our well-kept mini buses. They're cozy and clean, making your journey pleasant and easy.

bookRide.title: Book Your Ride Today
bookRide.description: Ready to go? Book your mini bus ride with Hoppla now and enjoy an easy journey!

404.title: This page could not be found
404.description: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

HelpLinks.DocumentationDescription: Learn how to use the site properly.
